# Layer 2 Manifest - PREMIUM content (MoneyClub members)
# ================================================================
# Layer 2 = Layer 1 (all public content)
#         + PREMIUM folders listed below
#
# These folders contain the "brain" - the valuable content
# that differentiates premium from community shell.
#
# RULE: Layer 2 excludes Layer 3 personal data.
# ================================================================

# === PREMIUM ADDITIONS (on top of Layer 1) ===

# Knowledge base (pre-digested expert content)
knowledge/dossiers/
knowledge/playbooks/
knowledge/dna/
knowledge/sources/

# Expert agents (cloned minds)
agents/persons/

# Cargo agents (C-level, sales, marketing roles)
agents/cargo/

# Processed content
processing/

# === LAYER 3 EXCLUSIONS (never in Layer 2) ===
# These are stripped from Layer 2 pushes:
#   - inbox/          (raw user uploads)
#   - logs/           (session logs)
#   - .env*           (API keys)
#   - .mcp.json       (MCP secrets)
#   - .claude/agent-memory/  (runtime state)
#   - .claude/aios/          (runtime state)
#   - .claude/sessions/      (runtime state)
#   - .claude/monitoring/    (runtime state)
#   - system/backups/        (personal backups)
#   - system/jarvis-voice/audiobooks/  (personal audio)
#   - .company-data/  (company data - Layer 3)
